about_the_game:
Wanna Boyfriend's Rescue adult gifs and all concepts (monsters and characters) in your pocket?



This pack contains Boyfriend's Rescue adult gifs, concept arts (monsters and characters), and sketches from the creative process until the launched version of the game. Check the ideas before the biggest project from Male Doll in 2020! Also, you can use the concepts to make your wallpapers and/or have fun without having to access the game. In other words, you'll get:


  • 13 Adult Gifs from Boyfriend's Rescue;
  • 3 Adult Scenes;
  • 18 Concept Arts;
  • 51 Sketches (monsters and characters);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Boyfriend's Rescue\Adult Art Pack

content_descriptors.notes: It contains strong language, partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
